00018         struct base_type::base_type_impl : public attribute::attribute_impl
00019         {
00020                 base_type_impl(user_type* base, size_t this_offset)
00021                         : attribute_impl(ATTR_BASE_TYPE)
00022                         , m_base(base)
00023                         , m_offser(this_offset)
00024                 { }

00038                 : attribute(new base_type_impl(base, this_offset))

00040                 m_impl = static_cast<base_type_impl*>(attribute::m_impl);

00052         const user_type& base_type::get_base() const
00053         {
00054                 return *m_impl->m_base;
00055         }
